messages.subject: newbie from Rhode Island
messages.msgSnippet: Anyway, it works for us. I am though, totally open to others opinions and thoughts on this!! :-) Well...I think 3-4 year olds are too young for speech
messages.messageBody:
"Anyway, it works for us. I am though, totally open
to others opinions and thoughts on this!! :-)"

Well...I think 3-4 year olds are too young for speech therapy. I think
they're too young for any kind of schooling. I think it's damaging. I
think if your goal is unschooling, then getting school out of your
lives and thinking SOONER is better than later.:)

How's that for a few opinions? (picture me smiling here, I AM serious,
but I'm having fun too).

I really believe that if you think this is all helping him, you might
want to read a LOT more about unschooling and see if you still think
that!! You might just find that a joyful, interesting home is the BEST
thing for him.

Ren
learninginfreedom.com
